channel.title: What do you use to run, compile, and maintain your server while it is online?
channel.description:
Please vote on what you use to run and compile your server. If you vote "Other", please make a post explaining what you use.
Also, if you use something interesting as maintenance for the server while it is online (restarter, special GUI) then please make post explaining what it is you use.
Thanks.

item.title: What do you use to run, compile, and maintain your server while it is online?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:548834”]The only time your server should ever have to come down is when changes to the core are made. The rest of the content should be handled independently.[/quote]That could be useful, but it seems to me one would have to go far out of one’s way in order to make content be continously loaded… Rather than all defined at startup. It is an interesting idea, though.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you use to run, compile, and maintain your server while it is online?

item.title: What do you use to run, compile, and maintain your server while it is online?

item.title: What do you use to run, compile, and maintain your server while it is online?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:548834”]The only time your server should ever have to come down is when changes to the core are made. The rest of the content should be handled independently.[/quote]Jagex and almost all other game companies would like to have a word with you.

While that design pattern is fine, it’s not a requirement or bad if your server restarts when you add content.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you use to run, compile, and maintain your server while it is online?
